casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
John Marshall SPENCE. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 15, 2016. Jonathan I. Edelstein and David M. Kelly, in support of the petition. Emily D. Trudeau, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 110 , 138 A.3d 1048 (2016), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
